# Chart

## Contents

[TOC]

------

## Method overview

| General                                  | Set                                      | Get                                      | Callback                                 |
| ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| draw<br />resize<br />destroy<br />drawFocus | clearParams<br />setParams<br />setData<br />setTipOnOff<br />moveTipAt<br />setSliderAt<br />setPeriodDates<br />setSliderToMark<br />setSliderToMarkDay<br />clearChartFilter<br />setChartFilterKey<br />clearIgnoreLimit setIgnoreLimitKey | getParams<br />getElm<br />getLegendColor<br />getPartition<br />getPeriodDateIndexs<br />getSliderDate<br />getChartFilterKeys<br />getIgnoreLimitKeys<br /> | onBeforeDraw<br />onDraw<br />onResize<br />onTipOnOff<br />onTipMove<br />onDele_ChartLegend<br />onDele_Coor<br />onDele_ScaleX<br />onDele_ScaleY |

------

## Methods

### setParams(params)

設定參數,來改變繪圖的細節

也可以用setParams(key,value)的方式設定

| Argument | Type   |
| -------- | ------ |
| params   | object |

```javascript
var view = Matisse.Chart('#c1');
view.setParams({
  type: [['Trend'], ['Bar']],
  dv: [2, 1]
}); 
```

------

### clearParams()

清除參數

------

### setData(dataX,dataY)

設定資料

| Argument | Type          |
| -------- | ------------- |
| dataX    | Array<String> |
| dataY    | Array<Array>  |

var view = Matisse.Chart('#c1');

view.setParams({

  type: [['Trend'], ['Bar']],

  dv: [2, 1]

});
